messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Engineering Foyer.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Warning Flux Anomaly detonated engineering foyer massive damage detected

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a number of wire eating mammals have migrated into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Service.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I was lost in space for an hour and I had to float through space, escape a crazy hotel, rewire an entire derelict station, and build a new teleporter to get back here

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I brought a cool space suit as a souveneir

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: And the nuke disk teleported into an emergency toolbox

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Medbay.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Centcomm called us all gay homos

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
